section.title: Pre-Install Requirements and Prerequisites
section.para: Ensure that the following requirements have been met before continuing with the installation.

section.title: Hardware Requirements
section.para: Sufficient system RAM and Java Heap size are very important when working with Resource Adaptors. For loads higher than 400 calls per second, it is recommended that your JVM has at least 1GB heap.

section.title: Software Prerequisites
section.para: The RA requires that &THIS.PLATFORM; JAIN SLEE is correctly set.

step.title: Building the source code

important.para: Maven 2.0.9 (or higher) is used to build the release. Instructions for using Maven2, including install, can be found at

step.para: Use Maven to build the deployable unit binary.

Once the build is completed, you should have the deployable-unit jar file in the target directory. If &THIS.PLATFORM; JAIN SLEE is installed and environment variable JBOSS_HOME is set to point to the underlying &JEE.PLATFORM; directory, then, the deployable unit jar will also be deployed in the container.

The script will copy the RA deployable unit jar to the default &THIS.PLATFORM; JAIN SLEE server/default/deploy directory. You can deploy to another server profile using the argument -Dnode=.

section.title: Uninstalling &THIS.PLATFORM; JAIN SLEE &THIS.RA; Resource Adaptor
section.para: To uninstall the Resource Adaptor simply execute the provided ant script build.xml undeploy target:
The script will delete the RA deployable unit jar from the default &THIS.PLATFORM; JAIN SLEE server profile deploy directory. To undeploy from another server profile use the argument -Dnode=.
